We collect only the data necessary to provide the service, improve the testing experience, and communicate with you.
We do not sell or share your data with third parties. Temporary logs may be stored for debugging, abuse prevention, or service improvement. Authentication cookies are used on the game panel (separate subdomain) and are required for login functionality. These cookies are not used for tracking or analytics. Any data collected is handled responsibly and retained only for as long as necessary during this testing phase. By using this service, you consent to this limited and purpose-specific data handling policy.
